notes.text: sap.suite.ui.microchart.AreaMicroChart: Hide min/max labels in case the truncation occurs
sap.suite.ui.microchart.StackedBarMicroChart: Calculate correct label color on theme change
sap.suite.ui.microchart: No Data placeholder displayed whenever a Microchart is not supplied with the data.
sap.suite.ui.microchart: Change No Data placeholder label to lower case "No data"
sap.suite.ui.microchart: Fix position of "No data" text in IE
sap.suite.ui.microchart.ComparisonMicroChartRenderer : set the empty div element as unfocusable so that focus does not get trapped inside header container.

sap.suite.ui.microchart.InteractiveBarChart : Not rendering in compact density mode so added check on after rendering of control to see class "sapUiSizeCompact" is applied and render accordingly also interactiveness of bars are maintained correctly.
sap.suite.ui.microchart.InteractiveDonutChart : Interactiveness of donut chart is lost when rendered in compact density mode.
sap.suite.ui.microchart.DeltaMicroChart: Width property not taken into account
sap.suite.ui.microchart.InteractiveDonutChartSegment: Unit of Value missing in InteractiveDonutChart.
